#define mod 100003LL
#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define N 100011
#define ma 7e9
using namespace std;
int bit[2*N],maxval;
ll powmod(ll a,ll b,ll c)
{
 ll res=1LL;
 while(b>0)
 {
  if(b&1)
  res=(res*a)%c;
  a=(a*a)%c;
  b/=2;
 }
 return res;
}
ll inverse(ll a)
{
if(a==0)
return 1LL;
else
return powmod(a,mod-2,mod);
}
void update(int idx,int val)
{
 while(idx<=maxval)
 {
  bit[idx]+=val;
  idx+=(idx & -idx);
 }
}
int query(int idx)
{
 int sum=0;
 while(idx>0)
 {
   sum+=bit[idx];
   idx-=(idx & -idx);
 }
 return sum;
}

ll fact[2*N];
long long factMOD(ll n, ll MOD)
{
    long long res = 1;
    while (n > 0)
    {
        for (int i=2, m=n%MOD; i<=m; i++)
            res = (res * i) % MOD;
        if ((n/=MOD)%2 > 0)
            res = MOD - res;
    }
    return res;
}
ll nck(ll n,ll k)
{
 ll ans;
 n-=(k-1);
 ans=factMOD(n,mod);
 ans=ans*inverse(factMOD(k,mod));
 ans=ans%mod;
 ans=ans*inverse(factMOD(n-k,mod));
 ans=ans%mod;
 return ans;
}
ll cal(ll a)
{
int i;
ll an=0;

 while(a>=mod)
 {
 an+=a/mod;
 a/=mod;
 }
 return an;
}
int main()
{
int t,i,j;

fact[i]=(fact[i-1]*i)%mod;
ll n,k;

{
 ll an;
 cin>>n>>k;

 {
 ll a1=cal(n-k+1);

 if(a1==a2+a3)
